moves.1. e4: e4 is good choice, open debut when you want to play and win
moves.2. Bc4: bishop on c4 is old idea but so what???
moves.2... Nf6 3. Nc3 c6: c6 looks not good and in my oppinion is waste of time
moves.4. Nf3: but knight on f3 is not the best move now...
moves.5. exd5: e:d is just one if white doen't want to play only in defence in this game...
moves.5... b5: b5 is in the first view active move but in deeply thought is bad waste of temp
moves.6. Bb3 b4: b4 is maybe outside of a correct course
moves.7. Na4: knight goes to the end of board and this is not best zone for active play...
moves.7... e4: e4 is not conditional move in my strategy... so untypical move
moves.8. Ng5: this may be  not the best idea there for white to play...
moves.8... Nxd5: now black control the center and have good bishops... white have quick Chance to make 0-0
moves.9. Nxe4: White take a pawn and black now have a good temp and attack
moves.9... Qe7: horse on e4 is bad animal ;-)
moves.10. Qe2: just one saving move there for white
moves.10... Nf4: so interesting idea - now have knight on g2...
moves.11. Bxf7+: now white make decision to play aggressive and make risk move
moves.11... Kxf7: best move because if queen takes on f7 white have knight on d6!
moves.12. Qf3: NOW there are 2 stupid animals on the board - on e4 and f4
moves.12... g5: g5 is terrible and really bad... but only for the black :-)
moves.13. g3 Bg4: good idea for black- now if white play Q:g4 black have q:e4 and after this Q:h1...
moves.14. Qb3+: just one saving move in this position...
moves.14... Be6 15. Qf3: and again just one saved move... now black have a draw if they want but black want to win!
moves.16. O-O: 0-0 and all problems with security of white king is over
moves.16... g4: g4 is aggressive but not so deeply move
moves.17. Qd1: queen on d1 is the best one... now white have d3 or d4 or g:f
moves.17... Bd5: black bishop goes to the h1-a8 diagonal
moves.18... Bxe4: this is relay bad decision for black... strong bishop for knight
moves.19. dxe4 Qxe4: now black have Q on g2
moves.20... Bxf4: now white have g:f and rock on e1 and after this g:f...
moves.21. Re1 Qf5 22. gxf4 Qxf4: now white have good rocks and queen but have a bad figure as well on a4... also g line is trouble for white king and g4 pawn is danger...
moves.23. Qd3: white see Queen on G3 and then rock on a-d1
moves.25. Ref1+ Kg7: and no place for black king :-)
moves.26. Qd4+ Kg6: black king goes to the centre.
moves.27... c5: miserable attempt to go to  draw
moves.28. Re6+:
best move
now black king must go to h5 and see kings guillotined head :-)
